Detailed Description

A class for adding url parameters. 

 URLParams params;
 params.add( "uin", 10 );
 params.add( "user_name", "Chuck Norris" );
 MC2String urlParams = params;
 // urlParams will now be: "?uin=10&user_name=Chuck%20Norris"
